metrics.gri_101_2_activities_brands_products_ser: Global group of energy and petrochemical companies, employing around 96,000 people across more than 70 countries. Activities range from oil and gas exploration and production to marketing of fuels and lubricants, and research and development. Increasingly offering low-carbon energy solutions.
